alert.note: Alert for Keith; Lincoln; McPherson; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:09AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Perkins, southeastern Keith, northwestern Lincoln and south central McPherson Counties through 145 AM CDT/1245 AM MDT/... At 108 AM CDT/1208 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Ringgold to Paxton. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Sutherland, Hershey, Paxton, Sarben, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, North Platte Airport, Grainton, Coker, O`Fallons, Nevens, Big Bald Hill and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 21. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 141 and 184. Highway 83 between mile markers 76 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
